We’ve been having a couple of meetings about video here in RBI towers over the last few weeks. I always recommend our video virgin hacks check our [Andy Dickinson’s blog](http://www.andydickinson.net/), because he gets this stuff so right…

I think this video [he produced recently](http://www.andydickinson.net/2008/02/17/a-video-guide-to-video-strategy/) sums up things beautifully:

<object height="355" width="425"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/s014hNGowTs&rel=1&border=0"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed height="355" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/s014hNGowTs&rel=1&border=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" wmode="transparent"></embed></object>

I rather enjoyed [Cyndy’s video response](http://cyndygreen.wordpress.com/2008/02/25/low-end-gear-a-rebuttal-to-andy-dickenson/), too…
